QuestData.Title: Cairn of Bone
QuestData.Description: Your mind felt clear.$b$bYou thought you were focused.$b$bMaybe it was the droning of the nearby insects that put you to sleep. That must've been it!$b$bOut of the corner of your eye, you see another of the stone formations just north of here.$b$bPerhaps it's quieter at that one...
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Meditation Candle at the Cairn of Bone.
